attributes.action: Drivers  of disabled Scooters  to be registered and  made accountable  for  dangerous driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Due to the increase in  accidents .Drivers of motorised mobility disabled scooters of all classes and motorised wheelchairs to register  , disply a vehicle identification  number plate,  carry manatory Third party  liability insurance and  be included in the Road traffic act .
The requirment that  users  of mobility motorised scooters  sit a  medical and fit  to  use test .
 Mobility scooters to be classed as motor vehicles not mechanically propelled vehicles  .
